General.Name: Neogrid Participações S.A
General.Description: Neogrid Participações S.A., together with its subsidiaries, develops, licenses, sells, and implements customized software for the management and synchronization of supply chains worldwide. The company also provides related technical advisory and training services. In addition, it offers software and databases installation, configuration, maintenance, and technical IT support services. It serves manufacturers and retailers; and agribusiness, CPG, electronics, fashion, home improvement, and pharma and healthcare segments. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Joinville, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida Santos Dumont, 935, Joinville, SC, Brazil, 89218-105
